name: Trials of Entos
description:
TRIALS OF ENTOS King Midas, the cruel and greedy king of legend, has thrown you into his labyrinth for a petty crime. What waits for you in the dark? Is there really an exit? Meet some of the other unlucky few that wander these halls and try to stay alive. A top-down horror adventure in a Greek mythology setting. Team members: 

Game Developer - SaftigMelo https://saftigmelo.itch.io/ 

Narrative Designer, Writer - AmandaL https://violeturningviolet.itch.io/ violeturningviolet@gmail.com 

Animator, Illustrator, UI Design - Lintop https://linttop.itch.io/ Instagram: @Linttop Twitter: @Linttoop Composer, 

Sound Designer - Gruber Discord: @OfficialGruber https://officialgruber.wixsite.com/gruber 

Additional Programming - AnonymousHelper 

itch.io SaftigMelo 
tch.io violeturningviolet 
itch.io Linttop
Gruber Portfolio | Gruber

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement
Space - Dash
E - Interact
